name: Carmageddon II Game Data
summary: A TWT file is a game data file used by Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now. It is a compressed archive that contains game assets or settings. For example, DATA.twt contains several .TXT files, which modders can extract and modify to change Carmegeddon II's settings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Stainless Games Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now

macos.display_name: Stainless Games Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
